howItWorks.title: How It Works

step1.title: Vehicle Purchased
step1.description: Vehicle is purchased from auction houses across the country.

step2.title: Arrives at Warehouse
step2.description: Vehicle is transported and received at our secure warehouse facility.

step3.title: Inspection & Documentation
step3.description: Complete vehicle inspection, photography, and documentation.

step4.title: Secure Storage
step4.description: Vehicle is stored in our climate-controlled, secure facility.

step5.title: Container Loading
step5.description: Professional container loading with proper securing methods.

step6.title: Export Shipping
step6.description: Vehicle ships to its global destination with full tracking.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Building the future of vehicle logistics since 2010
about.description: We are a global leader in auction vehicle logistics, providing secure storage, expert handling, and reliable export services to clients worldwide.

t1.title: Company Founded
t1.description: Started with a single warehouse and a vision to transform vehicle logistics.

t2.title: Warehouse Expansion
t2.description: Expanded to 3 facilities covering over 500,000 sq ft of storage space.

t3.title: Export Growth
t3.description: Reached 30+ export destinations with streamlined customs processing.

t4.title: Global Operations
t4.description: Now serving 50+ countries with state-of-the-art logistics technology.
